New Records: Shohei Ohtani set a record with the most RBIs (10) in a single game.
He became the first player to achieve a 50/50 season (50 home runs, 50 stolen bases).
Key Match Events: Shohei Ohtani had an outstanding performance with multiple home runs and stolen bases.
Post-Match Reflections: Dodgers' manager Dave Roberts highlighted the significance of Ohtani's achievement.
Miami's manager Skip Schumaker acknowledged respect for Ohtani and criticized an intentional walk attempt.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was noted for its historical context and Ohtani's impact on the season.
